summary: A young boy-genius befriends his grandfather's robot, designed as a test pilot for space travel and coveted by foreign spies.
cast: Charles Drake|Karin Booth|Billy Chapin|Taylor Holmes|Steven Geray|Henry Kulky|Franz Roehn|Hal Baylor|Peter Brocco|Steve Carruthers|Jack Daly|Franklyn Farnum|Norman Field|Art Gilmore|Bill Hickman|Maurice Hill|Paul Power|Alan Reynolds|William Schallert|Robert Shayne|Charles Sherlock|J. Lewis Smith|Norman Stevans|Lyle Talbot|Emmett Vogan|Helen Winston
title: Tobor el grande
